details.title: The Way to Go
details.summary:
Go (sometimes called Golang) is one of the most popular languages today, and is a key part of many enterprise tech stacks. Many developers prefer Go to other languages like C++ and Scala because of its memory management model which allows for easier concurrency.

In this course, you will learn the core constructs and techniques of the language. After going through the basics, you will then learn more advanced Go concepts like error-handling, networking, and templating. You'll learn how to program efficiently in Go by gaining knowledge of common pitfalls and patterns, as well as by building your own applications.
details.brief_summary: Gain insights into Go's core constructs, advanced concepts like error-handling and networking, and learn efficient programming techniques and common pitfalls in this popular language.

categories.title: Origin, Context and Popularity of GO
categories.summary: Get familiar with Go's origins, purpose, key features, and its rise in popularity.

categories.title: Basic Constructs and Elementary Data Types
categories.summary: Grasp the fundamentals of Go's basic constructs, data types, pointers, and essential operations.

pages.title: Solution Review: Season of a Month

categories.title: Control Structures
categories.summary: Work your way through decision-making, error handling, looping constructs, and flow control in Go.

pages.title: Solution Review: Variable Number of Arguments

categories.title: Functions
categories.summary: Enhance your skills in Go's functions, including recursion, closures, and optimization techniques.

pages.title: Challenge: Filling Array with Loop Counter
Solution Review: Filling Array with Loop Counter

categories.title: Arrays and Slices
categories.summary: Explore Go arrays, slices, initialization, manipulation, and problem-solving techniques.

categories.title: Maps
categories.summary: Focus on using key-value pairs in maps, iterating, checking existence, and practical examples.

categories.title: Packages

pages.title: Solution Review:  Construct a Double-Linked List
Accurate Computations and the big Package
Custom Packages: Folder Structure, go install and go test

categories.summary: Build on using Go's standard library, custom packages, sync mechanisms, and external libraries.

categories.title: Structs and Methods

pages.title: Solution Review: Coordinates of a Point
Receivers and Methods as Pointers and Values
Solution Review: Implement Stack Data Structure

categories.summary: Step through struct creation, advanced concepts, methods, and practical coding challenges.

categories.title: Interfaces and Reflection

pages.title: Solution Review: Make a Simple Interface
Solution Review: Advancing the Simple Interface
Solution Review: Advancing the Shapes Analysis
Challenge: Sort People with Sorter Interface
Solution Review: Sort People with Sorter Interface
Challenge: Make a Stack with Variable Internal Types

categories.summary: Unpack the core of interfaces, reflection, type assertions, type switches, and generic programming in Go.

categories.title: Reading and Writing

pages.title: Solution Review: Analyzing Input from Keyboard
Challenge: Writing to a WIKI Page
Solution Review: Writing to a WIKI Page
Reading and Writing Files with Slices

categories.summary: Examine reading and writing operations in Go, including file handling, data serialization, and user input.

pages.title: Error-Handling and Panicking in a User-Defined Package
Challenge: Generate Panic from Division by 0
Solution Review: Generate Panic from Division by 0

categories.title: Error-Handling and Testing
categories.summary: Grasp the fundamentals of Go's error-handling, testing practices, and performance optimization.

pages.title: Handling Concurrency and Parallelism with Go
Solution Review: Demonstrate the Blocking Nature
Solution Review: Devise Random Bit Generator
Challenge: Map Polar Points to Cartesian Points
Solution Review: Map Polar Points to Cartesian Points

categories.title: Goroutines and Channels
categories.summary: Deepen your knowledge of Go's concurrency through goroutines, channels, patterns, and synchronization.

pages.title: Polling Websites and Reading Web Page
Solution Review: Web Application for Statistics
Challenge: Web Application for Serving Guests
Solution Review: Web Application for Serving Guests

categories.title: Networking, Templating and Web-Applications
categories.summary: Focus on creating Go-based web applications, handling servers, and integrating cloud services.

categories.title: Common Go Pitfalls and Patterns
categories.summary: Piece together the parts of common Go pitfalls and effective programming patterns.

categories.title: Performance Advices
categories.summary: Sharpen your skills in optimizing Go performance with strings, structs, functions, goroutines, and memory management.

categories.title: Building a Complete Application

pages.title: Setting up the Structure of Application

categories.summary: Develop the URLShortener app "goto" with data storage, concurrency, persistent storage, and distributed architecture.

Basic Requirements for a Go Environment
Searching for Help and Documenting the Code

categories.title: Appendix
categories.summary: Work your way through Go installation, workspace setup, debugging, and performance optimization tools.

ref_author_details.short_bio: Physicist, software engineer, teacher and writer. Ever on the search for the ideal programming language.

jobs.name: custom package
jobs.startScript:
cp -r usercode/* /usr/local/go/src  
cd ..  
cd usr/local/go/src  
go install package1
clear
go run *.go
jobs.runScript:
cp -r /usercode/* /usr/local/go/src
rm /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/package1.a
go install package1
clear

jobs.name: clientserver
jobs.startScript:
cp -r usercode/server.go client.go /usr/local/go/src  
cd ..   
cd usr/local/go/src  
clear
go run server.go
jobs.runScript: cp -r /usercode/server.go client.go /usr/local/go/src

jobs.runScript:
cp -r /usercode/main.go person /usr/local/go/src
rm /usr/local/go/pkg/linux_amd64/person.a
go install person

jobs.name: gob storage
jobs.startScript:
cp -r usercode/main.go store /usr/local/go/src  
cd ..  
cd usr/local/go/src  
go install store
clear
echo "1"
touch store.gob
clear
go run main.go
jobs.runScript:
cp -r /usercode/store main.go /usr/local/go/src
go install store
clear
